verses.verse: לָמָ֣ה <WH4100> how long יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Jehovah תַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> Why standest בְּרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> thou afar off תַּ֝עְלִ֗ים <WH5956> hide לְעִתּ֥וֹת <WH6256> thou [thyself] in times בַּצָּרָֽה׃ <WH6869> adversary

בְּגַאֲוַ֣ת <WH1346> in [his] pride רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> The wicked יִדְלַ֣ק <WH1814> doth persecute עָנִ֑י <WH6041> the poor יִתָּפְשׂ֓וּ ׀ <WH8610> let them be taken בִּמְזִמּ֖וֹת <WH4209> in the devices ז֣וּ <WH2098> that חָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH2803> they have imagined

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִלֵּ֣ל <WH1984> boasteth רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> For the wicked עַל־ <WH5921> and תַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH8378> desire נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> of his heart's וּבֹצֵ֥עַ <WH1214> the covetous בֵּ֝רֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> and blesseth נִ֘אֵ֥ץ ׀ <WH5006> abhorreth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [whom] the LORD

רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> The wicked כְּגֹ֣בַהּ <WH1363> through the pride אַ֭פּוֹ <WH639> of his countenance בַּל־ <WH1077> does not יִדְרֹ֑שׁ <WH1875> will not seek אֵ֥ין <WH369> are There אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> [after God] God כָּל־ <WH3605> All מְזִמּוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4209> [is] not in all his thoughts

יָ֘חִ֤ילוּ <WH2342> grievous [דָרְכּו כ] (דְרָכָ֨יו <WH1870> along ק) בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֗ת <WH6256> are always מָר֣וֹם <WH4791> [are] far above מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <WH4941> thy judgments מִנֶּגְדּ֑וֹ <WH5048> of his sight כָּל־ <WH3605> for all צ֝וֹרְרָ֗יו <WH6887> out of his sight [as for] all his enemies יָפִ֥יחַ <WH6315> he puffeth בָּהֶֽם׃

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> He hath said בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> in his heart בַּל־ <WH1077> lest אֶמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> I shall not be moved לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <WH1755> generations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not be in בְרָֽע׃ <WH7451> [be] in adversity

אָלָ֤ה <WH423> of cursing פִּ֣יהוּ <WH6310> His mouth מָ֭לֵא <WH4390> is full וּמִרְמ֣וֹת <WH4820> and deceit וָתֹ֑ךְ <WH8496> and fraud תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Under לְ֝שׁוֹנ֗וֹ <WH3956> under his tongue עָמָ֥ל <WH5999> [is] mischief וָאָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> and vanity

יֵשֵׁ֤ב ׀ <WH3427> He sitteth בְּמַאְרַ֬ב <WH3993> in the lurking places חֲצֵרִ֗ים <WH2691> of the villages בַּֽ֭מִּסְתָּרִים <WH4565> in the secret places יַהֲרֹ֣ג <WH2026> doth he murder נָקִ֑י <WH5355> the innocent עֵ֝ינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes לְֽחֵלְכָ֥ה <WH2489> against the poor יִצְפֹּֽנוּ׃ <WH6845> are privily set

יֶאֱרֹ֬ב <WH693> He lieth in wait בַּמִּסְתָּ֨ר ׀ <WH4565> secretly כְּאַרְיֵ֬ה <WH738> as a lion בְסֻכֹּ֗ה <WH5520> in his den יֶ֭אֱרֹב <WH693> he lieth in wait לַחֲט֣וֹף <WH2414> to catch עָנִ֑י <WH6041> the poor יַחְטֹ֥ף <WH2414> he doth catch עָ֝נִ֗י <WH6041> the poor בְּמָשְׁכ֥וֹ <WH4900> when he draweth בְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH7568> him into his net
[וַדָּכַה כ] (יִדְכֶּ֥ה <WH1794> break ק) יָשֹׁ֑חַ <WH7817> [and] humbleth וְנָפַ֥ל <WH5307> may fall בַּ֝עֲצוּמָ֗יו <WH6099> by his strong ones [חֶלְכָּאִים כ] (חֵ֣יל ק) (כָּאִֽים׃ <WH2489> poor ק)

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> He hath said בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> in his heart שָׁ֣כַֽח <WH7911> hath forgotten אֵ֑ל <WH410> God הִסְתִּ֥יר <WH5641> he hideth פָּ֝נָ֗יו <WH6440> his face בַּל־ <WH1077> lest רָאָ֥ה <WH7200> see לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> he will never

קוּמָ֤ה <WH6965> Arise יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אֵ֭ל <WH410> O God נְשָׂ֣א <WH5375> lift up יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> thine hand אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> forget [עֲנִיִּים כ] (עֲנָוִֽים׃ <WH6041> afflicted ק)

עַל־ <WH5921> and מֶ֤ה ׀ <WH4100> how long נִאֵ֖ץ <WH5006> contemn רָשָׁ֥ע ׀ <WH7563> Wherefore doth the wicked אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> angels אָמַ֥ר <WH559> answer בְּ֝לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> in his heart לֹ֣א <WH3808> You will not תִּדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <WH1875> Thou wilt not require

רָאִ֡תָה <WH7200> Thou hast seen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> you עָ֘מָ֤ל <WH5999> mischief וָכַ֨עַס ׀ <WH3708> and spite תַּבִּיט֮ <WH5027> [it] for thou beholdest לָתֵ֪ת <WH5414> to requite בְּיָ֫דֶ֥ךָ <WH3027> [it] with thy hand עָ֭לֶיךָ <WH5921> and יַעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> committeth חֵלֶ֑כָה <WH2489> the poor יָ֝ת֗וֹם <WH3490> of the fatherless אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> You הָיִ֬יתָ <WH1961> have been עוֹזֵֽר׃ <WH5826> himself unto thee thou art the helper

שְׁ֭בֹר <WH7665> Break זְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> thou the arm רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked וָ֝רָ֗ע <WH7451> and the evil תִּֽדְרוֹשׁ־ <WH1875> [man] seek out רִשְׁע֥וֹ <WH7562> his wickedness בַל־ <WH1077> none תִּמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> [till] thou find
יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD מֶ֭לֶךְ <WH4428> [is] King עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶ֑ד <WH5703> and ever אָבְד֥וּ <WH6> are perished ג֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> the heathen מֵֽאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> out of his land

תַּאֲוַ֬ת <WH8378> the desire עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6035> of the humble שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ <WH8085> thou hast heard יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> LORD תָּכִ֥ין <WH3559> thou wilt prepare לִ֝בָּ֗ם <WH3820> their heart תַּקְשִׁ֥יב <WH7181> to hear אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <WH241> thou wilt cause thine ear

לִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> To judge יָת֗וֹם <WH3490> the fatherless וָ֫דָ֥ךְ <WH1790> and the oppressed בַּל־ <WH1077> will no יוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> may no more ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again לַעֲרֹ֥ץ <WH6206> oppress אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <WH376> he מִן־ <WH4480> is of הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
